release_notes:
• Fix compilation errors in Account.csv import
• Fix buy/sell detection and add duplicate account cleanup
• Fix Account.csv import to create assets from buy/sell history
• Add Performance Breakdown screen for return verification
• Fix Account.csv column mapping and add debug logging
• Major improvements: auto-save, accurate gain/loss, new withdrawal calc
• Fix persistence and prediction issues
• Bump version to 2.15.0+33
• Fix data wipe on app start and investment account double-counting
• Add data management screen to clean up orphaned data
